abstract: Shares of Orient-Express Hotels surged in trading on Thursday after the hotel arm of the Tata conglomerate of India made an offer for the rest of the company that it does not already own.
snippet: Shares of Orient-Express Hotels surged in trading on Thursday after the hotel arm of the Tata conglomerate of India made an offer for the rest of the company that it does not already own.
lead_paragraph: 6:00 p.m. | Updated Shares of Orient-Express Hotels surged in trading on Thursday after the hotel arm of the Tata conglomerate of India made an offer for the rest of the company that it does not already own.
